summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of SunoLegal website updates completed. All major features working correctly including logo replacement, Mumbai location, waitlist popup, new pages, and Google Forms integration.

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile menu home link click blocked by popup overlay when popup appears simultaneously
ui_bugs.details: Popup overlay intercepts click events on mobile menu items when popup appears at same time

passed_tests: Homepage loads with improved gradient (lighter slate colors, not pure black)
User logo appears correctly in navbar and footer
Waitlist popup appears on first homepage visit with 2-second delay
Popup has correct 'Join Waitlist (Users)' and 'I'm a Lawyer' buttons
Popup 'Not now' button closes popup and stores dismissal in localStorage
Popup respects 7-day dismissal period via localStorage
Navbar has 'Join Waitlist' and 'For Lawyers' buttons with correct styling
Footer has 'Get Early Access' section with both waitlist buttons
/waitlist page loads with two cards for Users and Lawyers
/pricing page loads with Free and Professional plans
/laws-and-schemes page loads with law category cards (Consumer Protection, Property & Tenancy, etc.)
/faq page loads with accordion FAQ items that expand/collapse correctly
/about page shows Mumbai India location and founder story
All Google Form buttons link to correct external URLs (Users: 1FAIpQLScNPCWdYMLW1vXmZhsL3NTxu8VJxEtAQq40iWjn1wNGB5K7cQ, Lawyers: 1FAIpQLSet8323DrdZSHRn5pVONUmz1yuiPBbxjiZwJ_un4XQWGkJm2A)
Google Form links open in new tabs (target='_blank')
Mobile menu button appears and opens correctly
Multiple waitlist access points confirmed (navbar, footer, hero, CTA sections)
Mumbai location appears in both About page and Footer
